data.text:
Yi-De Chen, arranger: What If We Had Never Met (MIDI Demo) for Drum Set, Bass Guitar, and String Orchestra (2024) [4’45”]

✱ Shin-Hong Chen, composer: What If We Had Never Met for Vocal and Rock Band (2016) [3’30”]

Note:

Shin-Hong Chen is the lead vocalist and songwriter for the highly acclaimed Taiwanese rock band Day of May. Known for his captivating voice and creative songwriting, Shin-Hong Chen has been a driving force in the band’s success since its formation in 1997. With numerous awards and a devoted fan base, Mayday has become one of Taiwan’s most beloved and influential bands.
